creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: flat collar necklace; graduated; crescent shaped pendant on bottom; open diamond cut-out with thick wire spiral at center of cut-out. with incised raised dome at center; incised designs on necklace of rooster and moth facing dragon and fish; flame or organic foliage designs on pendant and ends; bar closure with spiral ends and 3 flat beads; collar terminated in 2 spirals
title: Torque
